name: SKYFALL (itch) (89o)
description:
The world is collapsing.

Run around dodging rockets, bombs and meteors.

You're the only hope.

Collect crystals to improve the range of your teleportation ability.

A neverending apocalypse.

Find flowers to unlock more palettes, fragments of a dictionary and a poem to discover more about your past.

Chaos everywhere.

Includes 7 languages (of which 2 are spoken by humans) and 32 palettes.

Credits

Made entirely by 89o in 2 weeks. A remake of Focus by Jesse Venbrux (at the bottom of the page).

Fonts used: Haettenschweiler (logo), Compass Gold (logo 2), Source Sans Pro (logo 2 alternative), Frank Ruhl Hofshi (menu), Hyperbits ("made by" text).

Made for 4 jams with the themes: Then the night changed everything, Violence, No combat, A small world (although I didn't submit to that one in time).

You can listen to the soundtrack by paying at least $1.50 here or on bandcamp: https://89odev.bandcamp.com/album/skyfall-ost
